item.title: Til Cli
item.description: WIP TIL CLI tl;dr; til is a wrapper around a few other tools to simplify the management of a TIL repo, such as https://github.com/pjambet/til https://github.com/pjambet/til-cli Using fzf TODO Using an external editor TODO Creating a commit using the GitHub API TODO Conclusion Not finished yet
